item.title: By: Nightboat
item.dc:creator: Nightboat
item.description: OK, so my comment is about three years late, but what the hell - this is a near-perfect review of this album that almost exactly mirrors my thoughts on it. Superbly written.
item.content:encoded: OK, so my comment is about three years late, but what the hell – this is a near-perfect review of this album that almost exactly mirrors my thoughts on it. Superbly written.
